text: hamane unapar atyaachaar nahin kiya, balki unhonne svayan apane aap par atyaachaar kiya. phir jab tere rab ka aadesh aa gaya to usake ve poojy, jinhen ve allaah se hatakar pukaara karate the, unake kuchh bhee kaam na aa sake. unhonne vinaash ke atirikt unake lie kisee aur cheez mein abhivrddhi nahin kee
